typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	APT_GRID_ENABLE as any (YES),
	APT_GRID_COMPUTENODES as any (2),
	PS_APP_DIR as any ((Aspre-defined)),
	PS_DB_Name as any ((Aspre-defined)),
	PS_STREAM_INFO as any ((Aspre-defined)),
	PS_TD_Connector as any ((Aspre-defined))
}
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwtablegamesums1
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwheadcountstgs1
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwtablegamedtlhours1
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwtablegamerims1
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwtablegamedtls1
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwgstotherratingdtls1
source(output(
		c_prop_cd as string,
		c_pit_num as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> edwgsttableratingdtls1
edwheadcountstgs1, edwtablegamesums1, edwtablegamerims1, edwtablegamedtlhours1, edwtablegamedtls1 union(byName: true)~> fnlsubprops1
edwgsttableratingdtls1 derive(c_table_sub_prop_desc = 'if (edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "BAC" AND edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_pit_num = "31") then "BWW" else  if edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "BAC" then "BPP" else  if (edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "FLV" AND edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_pit_num = "21") then "FMV" else  if edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "FLV" then "FFL" else edw_gst_table_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd') ~> xfmsubpropgtrds1
fnlsubprops1 derive(c_table_sub_prop_desc = 'if (fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_prop_cd = "BAC" AND fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_pit_num = "31") then "BWW" else  if fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_prop_cd = "BAC" then "BPP" else  if (fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_prop_cd = "FLV" AND fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_pit_num = "21") then "FMV" else  if fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_prop_cd = "FLV" then "FFL" else fnl_sub_prop_s1@c_prop_cd') ~> xfmsubprops1
xfmsubpropgtrds1, xfmsubprops1, xfmsubpropgords1 union(byName: true)~> fnluniqsubprops1
fnluniqsubprops1 derive(c_prop_cd_KeyCol = 'c_prop_cd There is no Remove Duplicate Trans in ADF DataFlow, we need to explore',
		c_pit_num_KeyCol = 'c_pit_num There is no Remove Duplicate Trans in ADF DataFlow, we need to explore',
		c_table_sub_prop_desc_KeyCol = 'c_table_sub_prop_desc There is no Remove Duplicate Trans in ADF DataFlow, we need to explore') ~> rmdsubprops1
edwgstotherratingdtls1 derive(c_table_sub_prop_desc = 'if (edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "BAC" AND edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_pit_num = "31") then "BWW" else  if edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "BAC" then "BPP" else  if (edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "FLV" AND edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_pit_num = "21") then "FMV" else  if edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd = "FLV" then "FFL" else edw_gst_other_rating_dtl_s1@c_prop_cd') ~> xfmsubpropgords1
rmdsubprops1 sink(mapColumn(
		c_prop_cd,
		c_pit_num,
		c_table_sub_prop_desc
	)) ~> edwtablesubpropdimt1
